__e: Why you slipped me your number in case I ever need to ask anything?
Ask her questions, get a statement.
But, honey, someone brought this by our stoop. And I just thought you should be somewhere safe when you found out.
We need to find a way to get a message to my father.
I guess the best we can do is bring these back to his family.
Poor Oharles had been helpless. Not even able to send me a message of farewell.
